message: Bob, I believe this product presents a unique opportunity for you, and I'm pleased to offer it to you. Given its value, I'm setting the initial price at $1,500,000. I'm confident this will be a worthwhile investment for your business.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000.  This reflects the true value of the product while acknowledging your offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still think $1,200,000 is a more reasonable price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair price for both parties.
